entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:13 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 27 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
